name: nobby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Nobby places and things are expensive: They took us to a nobby restaurant that was far too pretentious for my liking. The industry is full of posh people who went to nobby private schools.
Nobby people and voices come from, or seem to come from, a high social class: It was no surprise that he had appointed one of his nobby mates to the position. She gets teased at school for her nobby accent.
More examplesFewer examplesThey live in a very nobby part of the city.He plays a nobby banker in the film.
